User-Agent:       Mozilla/5.0 (X11; U; SunOS sun4u; fr-FR; rv:1.8.0.7) Gecko/20061012 Firefox/1.5.0.7
Build Identifier: Mozilla/5.0 (X11; U; SunOS sun4u; fr-FR; rv:1.8.0.7) Gecko/20061012 Firefox/1.5.0.7

Two functions declarations 

Reproducible: Always

Steps to Reproduce:
1. Error occurs during build from the sources
2. In the mozconfig use the following options

ac_add_options --enable-svg 
ac_add_options --enable-svg-renderer=libart
ac_add_options --enable-system-libart 

3. Compilation fails in mozilla/layout/build/nsLayoutStatics.cpp


Run compilation (gmake -f client.mk build)
Actual Results:  
CC -o nsLayoutStatics.o -c  -DXPCOM_TRANSLATE_NSGM_ENTRY_POINT=1 -DMOZILLA_INTERNAL_API -DOSTYPE=\"SunOS5\" -DOSARCH=\"SunOS\" -DBUILD_ID=0000000000 -D_IMPL_NS_LAYOUT -DHAVE_I18N_LC_MESSAGES=1 -DMOZ_DEFAULT_TOOLKIT=\"gtk2\" -DMOZ_WIDGET_GTK2=1 -DMOZ_ENABLE_XREMOTE=1 -DMOZ_X11=1 -DMOZ_PHOENIX=1 -DMOZ_BUILD_APP=browser -DMOZ_XUL_APP=1 -DMOZ_ENABLE_CANVAS=1 -DMOZ_DISTRIBUTION_ID=\"org.mozilla\" -DMOZ_ENABLE_XFT=1 -DMOZ_ENABLE_GNOMEUI=1 -DMOZ_EXTRA_X11CONVERTERS=1 -DOJI=1 -DIBMBIDI=1 -DMOZ_VIEW_SOURCE=1 -DACCESSIBILITY=1 -DMOZ_XPINSTALL=1 -DMOZ_JSLOADER=1 -DNS_PRINTING=1 -DNS_PRINT_PREVIEW=1 -DMOZ_XTF=1 -DMOZ_MATHML=1 -DMOZ_SVG=1 -DMOZ_SVG_RENDERER_LIBART=1 -DMOZ_UPDATE_CHANNEL=default -DMOZ_FEEDS=1 -DMOZ_STORAGE=1 -DMOZ_SAFE_BROWSING=1 -DMOZ_URL_CLASSIFIER=1 -DMOZ_LOGGING=1 -DMOZ_USER_DIR=\".mozilla\" -DHAVE_ALLOCA_H=1 -DHAVE_ALLOCA=1 -DHAVE_STDINT_H=1 -DHAVE_INTTYPES_H=1 -DHAVE_SYS_INT_TYPES_H=1 -DHAVE_UINT64_T=1 -DMOZ_XUL=1 -DMOZ_PROFILELOCKING=1 -DMOZ_MORK=1 -DMOZ_DLL_SUFFIX=\".so\" -DXP_UNIX=1 -DUNIX_ASYNC_DNS=1 -DJS_THREADSAFE=1 -DMOZ_ACCESSIBILITY_ATK=1 -DMOZILLA_1_8_BRANCH=1 -DMOZILLA_LOCALE_VERSION=\"1.8.1rc\" -DMOZILLA_REGION_VERSION=\"1.8.1rc\" -DMOZILLA_SKIN_VERSION=\"1.8\"  /export/home/william/community/mozilla/firefox/firefox.FIREFOX_2_0_RELEASE/mozilla/layout/build/nsLayoutStatics.cpp
"/export/home/william/community/mozilla/firefox/firefox.FIREFOX_2_0_RELEASE/mozilla/layout/build/../generic/nsBlockFrame.h", line 680: Warning: nsBlockFrame::GetAscent hides the virtual function nsFrame::GetAscent(nsBoxLayoutState&, int&).
"../../dist/include/dom/nsIDOMXULMultSelectCntrlEl.h", line 75: Warning: nsIDOMXULMultiSelectControlElement::GetSelectedItem hides the virtual function nsIDOMXULSelectControlElement::GetSelectedItem(nsIDOMXULSelectControlItemElement**).
"/export/home/william/community/mozilla/firefox/firefox.FIREFOX_2_0_RELEASE/mozilla/layout/build/nsLayoutStatics.cpp", line 172: Error: The function "NS_InitSVGRendererLibartGlobals" must have a prototype.
"/export/home/william/community/mozilla/firefox/firefox.FIREFOX_2_0_RELEASE/mozilla/layout/build/nsLayoutStatics.cpp", line 232: Error: The function "NS_FreeSVGRendererLibartGlobals" must have a prototype.


Expected Results:  
It should compile :)

A patch will be attached after by declaration

comments.text:
Created attachment 243924
Fixe the compilation problem by adding the missing declarations

This patch add the two missing function declaration if libart is defined as SVG renderer
comments.author: wbonnet@on-x.com
comments.creator: wbonnet@on-x.com
comments.raw_text: This patch add the two missing function declaration if libart is defined as SVG renderer

comments.author: alfred.peng@gmail.com
comments.text: benjamin, any comments for the patch? Looks the prototype is needed here only for 1.8 Branch. For trunk, the code is different.
comments.raw_text: benjamin, any comments for the patch? Looks the prototype is needed here only for 1.8 Branch. For trunk, the code is different.
comments.creator: alfred.peng@gmail.com

comments.author: benjamin@smedbergs.us
comments.text: libart is not supported on any of our active branches. Use cairo.
comments.raw_text: libart is not supported on any of our active branches. Use cairo.
comments.creator: benjamin@smedbergs.us

comments.author: wbonnet@on-x.com
comments.text:
Hi

I can understand that since it is not supported you won't fix the bug, that's the way it is. But here the problem is that it does not compile.

Shouldn't you either include this patch by just adding the declarations ? or if you don't want to support it at all (this mean accept to have compilation errors), remove the --enable-svg-renderer=libart and --enable-system-libart from configure ? 

regards,
William
comments.raw_text:
Hi

I can understand that since it is not supported you won't fix the bug, that's the way it is. But here the problem is that it does not compile.

Shouldn't you either include this patch by just adding the declarations ? or if you don't want to support it at all (this mean accept to have compilation errors), remove the --enable-svg-renderer=libart and --enable-system-libart from configure ? 

regards,
William
comments.creator: wbonnet@on-x.com
